location: 君品酒店 五樓 亮廳
wedding_address: 台北市大同區承德路一段3號
parking_info: 君品與京站百貨共用停車場
parking_info2: B4/B5 D區即可至君品酒店電梯口
gretting:
Love is patient and kind
 Love does not envy or boast
 It is not arrogant or rude. It does not
 insist on its own way; It is not irritable or resentful
 It does not rejoice at wrongdoing, but rejoices with the truth.
 Love bears all things, believes all things
 hopes all things, endures all things.
 Love never ends.
ceremoney_info: 下午 16:00 戶外證婚儀式
banquet_entry_info: 晚間 18:30 恭候嘉賓入席
banquet_info: 晚間 19:00 喜宴準時開席
afterparty_address: 台北市大安區光復南路452號
